attributes.additional_details:
The cost of living has sky rocketed. 
But it’s clear to see fuel costs fall down to the VAT and tax that the government control. 
At this rate no one will be able to afford to drive. Meaning no one can get to work, companies will soon have to cut deliveries of goods because of this, meaning we will be even worse Off day to day.
attributes.background:
I think it’s time the government stopped the ridiculous charges on fuel. 
It’s becoming impossible to afford to even own a vehicle now.
It’s shot up to a ridiculous amount.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for very similar actions:

Remove duty on motor fuel completely: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613908

Halve fuel duty and remove VAT on fuel prices: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618421

Suspend VAT on road fuels to reduce fuel costs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610567
